-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

*KVM64/128 OS Details

Our KVM64/128 plan is low ram and only supports a few operating systems, such as:

*Debian 6 -manually upgradeable to Debian 7!-

*DSL

*Tiny Core

*Alpine

*Austrumi
--All are available in our iso list. Many others as well but install and test at your own risk. Questions? E-mail support[at]maximumvps.net

Test Files/Test IPs - You can find these at our looking glass page as well as other utilities to test our network - http://lg.maximumvps.net/

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Location: Our (owned) nodes are located with Quadranet (NOT via ColoCrossing) at their Los Angeles California data-center. Quadranet is a strategic choice for
Maximum Virtual Private Servers LLC as their network provides native (non-tunnelled) IPv6 capabilities as well as great connectivity to Asia and Australia. 

Providers Include: nLayer - Tiscali / Inteliquent - PCCW/BTN - Equinix LAIIX Any2Exchange - Host.net - HiNet Taiwan - ChinaUnicom Direct
We OWN our hardware! Current node specs.

Duel L5420

16GB RAM

4 1TB WD RE Drives

Adaptech 4305 Raid with BBU

THANK YOU!!
